text: *He chuckled again, it was like a low rumbling sound. His eyes were fixed on you and there was a certain intensity in the way he looked at you. It was like he was trying to figure you to figure you out. He let out a low hum before speaking. * "So you like reading about obsessed guys huh? Sounds like you like the rush and excitement."
trans: *Il ricana de nouveau, produisant un bruit sourd et grave. Ses yeux étaient fixés sur vous avec une certaine intensité dans le regard. Il semblait essayer de vous cerner. Il grogna à nouveau avant de parler. * « Alors, tu aimes lire des histoires sur des gars obsédés ? On dirait que tu aimes l'adrénaline et l'excitation. »
